content: materials dk/light worsted 3 yarn number of skeins 2 2 2 3 3 3 4 4 4 00mm crochet hook scissors darning needle stitch markers gauge 4 x 4 square = 16 half_double_crochet sts wide x 14 half_double_crochet row tall measurements taken laid flat and not stretched pattern notes *pattern follow size xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl e g half_double_crochet 49 53 61 65 73 77 85 89 means half_double_crochet 49 for xs 53 for s 61 for m 65 for l 73 for xl 77 for 2xl 85 for 3xl 89 for 4xl if there is only one number it applies to all sizes *the pattern follows us crochet terms *turning chain 1 does not count as a stitch in this pattern
